Articles.Content:
Hello everyone. I have been venturing in making things go boo...errr to orbit I mean, for a while but just now decided to venture into the forums. The closest I've come to landing at Mun has been crashing into its surface killing everyone on board. Felt a mix of pride and remorse for the loss of my ship

I've been wondering for a while. What are the must have mods? By this I mean, the most popular mods that almost everyone has? Recently I've been wanting to put satellites into orbit but I have no idea which pack to get, etc.
